description: Succulent salmon fillets simmered in a rich semi-dried tomato, olive and basil sauce. Have this Tuscan-inspired seafood delight ready in half an hour.
name: Tuscan-Inspired Salmon With Semi-Dried Tomatoes & Basil Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large, deep non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook salmon for 4 minutes or until golden. Turn and cook for a further 1 minute or until salmon is almost cooked through. Transfer to a plate.

Heat same pan over medium heat. Cook onion, garlic and capers, stirring, for 2 minutes or until fragrant. Add paste and cook for 2 minutes, scraping base of pan with a wooden spoon. Add tomatoes, olives and stock, then bring to the boil.
Return salmon to pan and cook for 1 minute or until warmed through. Scatter over basil and serve with lemon wedges and salad leaves.
